main.bio: My name is Sriram, I'm a Django-ReactJS Full Stack Web Developer. I love coding and I am fascinated by how the front-end interacts with the back-end and how to make them work together in a powerful way.
main.contactmessage: Contact me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

testimonials.text: He loves to teach stuff PRACTICALLY and that's what I like about him. Best tutor/coach ever!
Sriram is definitely one among the skilled developers who don't have to have a degree. Just ask him for an attractive web app or feature and he will do it for you!
